response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which we believe would greatly benefit your endeavors. Given its exceptional value and quality, we are offering it to you at an exclusive price of $14,000. This offer is tailored to reflect both the product's worth and your appreciation for it. We are confident that this price will not only make it accessible to you but also maximize the value you receive. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. We look forward to the opportunity to serve you.", "product_price": 14000}
